tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Also had her for an online section of ENGL 115, and both classes were excellent. Clear, concise, and quick responses when I emailed her with questions, and generally a pleasure to deal with. Her selections for readings were excellent and the workload was fair. Highly recommended!

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Sally is phenomenal. I had her for Ways of Reading, and she managed to teach us all these hard literary theories and make it easy to understand. She genuinely cares about you as a person, and was quick to respond to any emails or clarify things for you. The class was partially online so you could miss one and not miss out!

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Sally was a pretty decent prof, good teacher, easy grader as long as you apply her feedback to your assignments. I took this class because it was online through VIU, but didn\'t know she works at the Cowichan campus. She required both exams to be written in Cowichan, or you had to pay extra for assessment services at VIU. Rip off.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I have had a bad experience with it based on this one professor alone after having my first online course with her. She was quite ignorant through online text and very unclear. Also, as a first year course, I half-expected her to explain and remind students of certain assignments. Very little instruction and zero reminder for anything. No good.

comments: Sally is one of the best teachers I have ever had! She is very understanding and works with the students. I also enjoy the homework she gives. She does not make you do anything that will not be helpful to the learning outcomes of the class. Her class is well organized and offers lots of additional help outside of class. I recommended this teacher.

comments: Fantastic... what a fun, cool, teacher. Really gets you to think outside the box and explore your interests. Sally makes homework assignments enjoyable... how is that possible? Would highly recommend her as a professor!
